GSP29nysu51pu:1: jātibahutvam iti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ, tad vistareṇa vibhajyate tāḥ khalv imā
GSP29nysu51pu:4: NySBh_5,1.1 jāteḥ saṃkṣepeṇoktāyā vistaro vaktavya itīdānīm ārabhyate
GSP29nysu51pu:5: sādharmyādisūtram sādharmyavaidharmyotkarṣāpakarṣavarṇyāvarṇyavikalpasādhyaprāptyaprāptiprasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntānutpattisaṃśayaprakaraṇāhetvarthāpattyaviśeṣopapattyupalabdhyanupalabdhyanityanityakāryasamāḥ sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:11: NySBh_5,1.2 sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:13: dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ kriyāvāṃs tathā cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:14: evam upasaṃhṛte paraḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavatiṣṭhate niṣkriya ātmā vibhuno dravyasya niṣkriyatvād vibhu cākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ ca tathā cātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:15: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyasādharmyād niṣkriyeṇeti
GSP29nysu51pu:17: atha vaidharmyasamaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto loṣṭaḥ paricchinno dṛṣṭo na ca tathātmā tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:18: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:19: vaidharmyeṇa copasaṃhāraḥ niṣkriya ātmā vibhutvāt kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ niṣkriyaṃ loṣṭaḥ na ca tathātmā tasmān niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:20: vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na ca tathātmā tasmān na niṣkriya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:21: na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:22: atha sādharmyasamaḥ kriyāvāṃl loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cātmā tasmāt kriyāvān iti na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:24: NySBh_5,1.3 sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā sā tu dharmaviśeṣe nopapadyate gosādharmyād
GSP29nysu51pu:25: gotvāj jātiviśeṣād gauḥ sidhyati na tu sāsnādisambandhāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:26: aśvādivaidharmyād gotvād eva gauḥ sidhyati na guṇādibhedāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:27: tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākye iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:32: yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:33: atha na sparśavāṃl loṣṭavat kriyāvān api na prāpnoti viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:36: loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān avibhur astu viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:37: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:38: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:39: kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcil laghu yathā vāyuḥ evaṃ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiṃcit kriyāvat syād yathā loṣṭaḥ kiṃcid akriyaṃ yathātmā viśeṣo vā vācya iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:40: hetvādyavayavasāmarthyayogī dharmaḥ sādhyaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭānte prasañjayataḥ sādhyasamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:41: yadi yathā loṣṭas tathātmā prāptas tarhi yathātmā tathā loṣṭa iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:42: sādhyaś cāyam ātmā kriyāvān iti kāmaṃ loṣṭo 'pi sādhyaḥ atha naivaṃ na tarhi yathā loṣṭaḥ tathātmā //
GSP29nysu51pu:46: siddhaṃ ca kiṃcitsādhatmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum /
GSP29nysu51pu:47: evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti
GSP29nysu51pu:51: evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:52: NyS_5,1.7 prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād
GSP29nysu51pu:54: NySBh_5,1.7 hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā ? na tāvat prāpya
GSP29nysu51pu:56: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā ? aprāpya sādhakaṃ na bhavati nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:58: prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:61: NySBh_5,1.8 ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam
GSP29nysu51pu:63: NyS_5,1.9 dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau//
GSP29nysu51pu:64: NySBh_5,1.9 sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:66: kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvāṃl loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti
GSP29nysu51pu:68: kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyāhetuguṇaḥ ? vāyunā saṃyogaḥ saṃskārāpekṣaḥ vāyuvanaspatisaṃyogavad iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:71: NySBh_5,1.10 idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati atha ke pradīpam
GSP29nysu51pu:72: upādadate kimarthaṃ veti ? didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśyadarśanārtham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:73: atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate ? antareṇāpi pradīpāntataṃ dṛśyate pradīpaḥ tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam /
GSP29nysu51pu:74: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyata iti aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:78: yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta" iti tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram //
GSP29nysu51pu:81: NySBh_5,1.11 pratidṛṣṭāntaṃ bruvatā na viśeṣahetur apadiśyate anena
GSP29nysu51pu:82: prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:83: evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:84: sa ca kathaṃ hetur na syāt ? yady apratiṣiddhaḥ sādhakaḥ syād iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:86: NySBh_5,1.12 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51pu:87: apara āha prāg utpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti, tadabhāvān nityatvaṃ prāptaṃ, nityasya cotpattir nāsti /
GSP29nysu51pu:90: NyS_5,1.13 tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:92: utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:93: prāg utapatteḥ śabda eva nāsti, utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya
GSP29nysu51pu:94: sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate, kāraṇopapatter ayukto 'yaṃ doṣaḥ "prāg utpatteḥ kāraṇābhāvād" iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:97: NySBh_5,1.14 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte
GSP29nysu51pu:98: hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam, asti ca ghaṭenānityena, ato nityānityasādharmyād anivṛttiḥ saṃśaya iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:100: NyS_5,1.15 sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:101: NySBh_5,1.15 viśeṣād vaidharmyād avadhāryamāṇe 'rthe puruṣa iti, na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate /
GSP29nysu51pu:102: evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate /
GSP29nysu51pu:103: yadi vai labhate, tataḥ sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyānucchedād atyantaṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:104: gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:105: na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur bhavati //
GSP29nysu51pu:107: NySBh_5,1.16 ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:109: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati, dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāc chabdatvavad iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:110: evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa ucyamāno na prakaraṇam ativarttate , prakaraṇānativṛtter nirṇayānativartanam /
GSP29nysu51pu:117: NySBh_5,1.17 ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhaṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati
GSP29nysu51pu:118: yady ubhayasādharmyaṃ, tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati
GSP29nysu51pu:119: pratipakṣopapatter anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ, yadi pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedho nopapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:120: atha pratiṣedhopapattiḥ pratipakṣo nopapadyate, pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedhopapattiś ceti vipratiṣiddham iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:121: tattvānavadhāraṇāc ca prakriyāsiddhir viparyaye prakaraṇāvasānāt, tattvāvadhāraṇe hy avasitaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:124: NySBh_5,1.18 hetuḥ sādhanam, tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet /
GSP29nysu51pu:125: yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam, asati sādhye kasya sādhanam ? atha paścād, asati sādhane kasyedaṃ sādhyam ? atha yugapat sādhyasādane, dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:130: nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate, so
GSP29nysu51pu:132: yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti ? yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti
GSP29nysu51pu:134: NySBh_5,1.20 pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:137: NySBh_5,1.21 anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite
GSP29nysu51pu:139: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti, arthād āpadyate nityasādharmyān nitya iti, asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:141: NyS_5,1.22 anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:142: NySBh_5,1.22 anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt, anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ
GSP29nysu51pu:146: yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca nityaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:147: śabdaḥ, arthād āpanna, anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti
GSP29nysu51pu:149: na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam ity arthād āpadyate dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:150: NyS_5,1.23 ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvopapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:151: NySBh_5,1.23 eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve, sarvāviśeṣaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:156: NyS_5,1.24 kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:158: prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ, naivaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ dharmāntaram asti, yena aviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:159: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti, evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysu51pu:160: tatra pratijñārthavyatiriktam anyad udāharaṇaṃ nāsti, anudāharaṇaś ca hetur nāstīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:161: pratijñaikadeśasya codāharaṇatvam anupapannam, na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:163: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:164: sarvabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvopapatter anityatvam iti bruvatānujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvaṃ,
GSP29nysu51pu:167: NySBh_5,1.25 yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo
GSP29nysu51pu:168: nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate
GSP29nysu51pu:169: / ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca kāraṇopapattyā pratyavasthānam upapattisamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:171: NySBh_5,1.26 ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, yadi pratiṣidhyate nobhayakāraṇopapattiḥ syāt /
GSP29nysu51pu:176: ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet ? svapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:178: NySBh_5,1.27 nirdiṣṭasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyānityatvakāraṇasyābhāve 'pi vāyunodanād vṛkṣaśākhābhaṅgajasya śabdasyānityatvam upalabhyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:182: NySBh_5,1.28 prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate, na kāryasya kāraṇaniyamaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:183: yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate, kim atra pratiṣidhyata
GSP29nysu51pu:185: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysu51pu:188: gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat, na gṛhyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:190: NyS_5,1.29 tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ
GSP29nysu51pu:193: abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysu51pu:195: prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir ity" etan na sidhyati /
GSP29nysu51pu:201: NySBh_5,1.30 āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir nāsti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:205: yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ, upalabdhyā tad astīti pratijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:206: yan nāsti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ, anupalabhyamānaṃ nāstīti pratijñāyate
GSP29nysu51pu:210: āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvād upalabdher viṣayāḥ, teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nysu51pu:212: tadupalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:213: anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati, viṣayaḥ sa tasyeti //
GSP29nysu51pu:217: asti me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:219: seyam āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir iti nopalabdhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:220: tatra yad uktaṃ tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhir iti, etan nopapadyate //
GSP29nysu51pu:222: anityasamaḥ // NySBh_5,1.32 sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasamaḥ //5,1.32 anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād
GSP29nysu51pu:223: anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:224: so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād anityasama iti // NySBh_
GSP29nysu51pu:231: sādharmyād asiddheḥ pratiṣedhasyāpy asiddhiḥ, pratiṣedhyena sādharmyād iti
GSP29nysu51pu:232: NyS_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt
GSP29nysu51pu:234: NySBh_5,1.34 dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysu51pu:236: sa cobhayathā bhavati, kenacit samānaḥ kutaścid
GSP29nysu51pu:239: evaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ, nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ vā /
GSP29nysu51pu:241: tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasama" iti, etad ayuktam iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:242: aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam //
GSP29nysu51pu:243: NyS_5,1.35 nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:245: tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam ? yadi tāvat sarvadā bhavati ? dharmasya sadā bhāvād
GSP29nysu51pu:246: dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:253: NySBh_5,1.36 pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne
GSP29nysu51pu:254: 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam, anityatvopapatteś ca "nānityaḥ śabda" iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate
GSP29nysu51pu:256: iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:257: utapannasya nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasyānityatvaṃ, tatra paripraśnānupapattiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:259: paripaśnaḥ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti, ayam anupapannaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:260: kasmāt ? utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad
GSP29nysu51pu:261: anityatvam ; evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti /
GSP29nysu51pu:263: nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete, na sambhavataḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:264: tatra yad uktaṃ nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva, tad avartamānārtham uktam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:267: yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati, yathā ghaṭādikāryam ; anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:268: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:269: prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnām, vyavadhānāpohāc cābhivyaktir vyavahitānām
GSP29nysu51pu:270: tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti /
GSP29nysu51pu:276: yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate, vyavadhānāpohāc ca prayatnānantarabhāvino 'rthasyopalabdhilakṣaṇābhivyaktir bhavatīti, na tu śabdasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ kiṃcid upapadyate, yasya prayatnānantaram apohāc chabdasyopalabhilakṣaṇābhivyaktir bhavatīti, tasmād utpadyate śabdo
GSP29nysu51pu:278: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:281: NySBh_5,1.39 pratiṣedho 'py anaikāntikaḥ, kiṃcit pratiṣedhati kiṃcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:282: atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysu51pu:285: ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:287: NySBh_5,1.40 sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti //
GSP29nysu51pu:289: NySBh_5,1.41 yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:290: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:295: samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate /
GSP29nysu51pu:296: tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:297: NyS_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29nysu51pu:298: NySBh_5,1.42 pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram
GSP29nysu51pu:299: akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino matānujñā prasajyata iti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:300: NyS_5,1.43 svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣaḥ //
GSP29nysu51pu:301: NySBh_5,1.43 sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:305: 'nuddhṛtyānujñāya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati
GSP29nysu51pu:306: itthaṃ cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati /
GSP29nysu51pu:307: tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:308: kathaṃ kṛtvā ? yaḥ pareṇa prayatnakāryānekatvādityādinānaikāntikadoṣa uktaḥ, tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha /
GSP29nysu51pu:309: evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati /
GSP29nysu51pu:310: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysu51pu:311: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti /
GSP29nysu51pu:314: pratiṣedhahetuvādinaḥ dvitīyacaturthaṣaṣṭapakṣāḥ teṣāṃ sādhvasādhutāyāṃ mīmāṃsyamānāyāṃ caturthaṣaṣṭayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:318: doṣa" iti samānadoṣatvam evocyate, nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid asti /
GSP29nysu51pu:322: "pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo"+abhyupagamyate, nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyata iti
GSP29nysu51pu:324: punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ, tṛtīyacaturthayor matānujñā, prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysu51pu:329: anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter" ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yajyate, tadā viśeṣahetuvacanāt "prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasya, nābhivyaktir" iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti //
